about_the_game:
◆Story


Ike was originally living a peaceful and cozy life in the Otherworld of Leisure. However, one day, Ike was forced to say goodbye to this life and got involved in all kinds of troubles. A female thief and a female mage with horns disturbed Ike’s peace and barged into his life. How should Ike use his wisdom and strength to help himself overcome difficulties and capture the hearts of these beauties?!

◆Characters


Ali


A girl born in a slum. She had to learn various survival skills from an early age, including stealing and scamming. In order to help her family survive their deprived life, she started stealing at a young age and soon became a well-known thief in the local area. Even so, in order not to attract too much attention, the most common time for her to make a move was still to wait for a stranger to fall in the trap at the pub...

Lina


A fostered dragonborn. When she was a child, her family was worried that her physical appearance would leave her unable to fit in in the society, so they asked someone to cast a spell on her to temporarily hide her dragon's horns. She only found out that she was a dragonborn when she was almost an adult, but quickly accepted the fact, and used this power to become an excellent mage adventurer.

◆Gameplay


Choose your favourite character and play through that character's story and levels. You can pass the levels by reducing your opponent's HP to zero. If the battle round exceeds the upper limit or our HP drops to zero, you will fail.

During battle, there are four kinds of gems with different effects, each representing different functions. Just match and place three or more gems in the same row or column, and the gems will be annihilated and the effect of the gems will activate. The more gems you annihilate at one go, the more powerful the effect will be. Each gem has various special variations, and annihilating special gems can trigger more powerful chain-annihilation. Use this method wisely to greatly increase the chance of passing levels!

◆Game Features


◇2 cute heroines with distinct personalities
◇Super high-definition 3D models
◇Multi-stage clothes-burst system during battle
◇Japanese dubbing for all stories
◇Highly enjoyable and fast-paced match-3 system
◇Multiple enhanced abilities and skills
◇Special scenes support free mode

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , extreme violence, sexual assault , non-consensual sex, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Ike had been living a quiet life in a relaxed, otherworldly world, but one day a thief and a horned sorceress invade Ike's life. How can Ike use his wits and strength to get through this difficult time and win the hearts of these beauties?
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
